metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19212 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In libwebm through 2018-10-03, there is an abort caused by libwebm::Webm2Pes::InitWebmParser() that will lead to a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sludge: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
